korean: 그날이 특별했던 이유는 여러 가지가 있는데요,
우선 4년이라는 긴 시간의 끝이자 새로운 시작이었기 때문이에요.
그리고 그날 정말 많은 감정을 느꼈어요.
뿌듯함, 아쉬움, 기대감, 불안함 이런 게 다 섞여 있었거든요.
친구들과 마지막으로 학교에서 함께 시간을 보낸 것도 의미가 컸어요.
앞으로는 각자의 길을 가야 하니까 더 소중하게 느껴졌어요.
부모님이 자랑스럽다고 말씀해주신 것도 정말 감동적이었고요.
특히 엄마가 우시면서 축하해주시는 걸 보고 저도 울컥했어요.
그리고 그날은 과거를 돌아보고 미래를 생각하게 만드는 날이었어요.
대학 생활에서 뭘 배웠는지, 앞으로 어떻게 살아야 할지 고민했죠.
그런 여러 의미들이 겹쳐서 특별한 날이 된 것 같아요.
english: There are several reasons why that day was special,
first, because it was the end of a long 4 years and also a new beginning.
It was a turning point from being a college student to becoming a member of society.
And I felt really many emotions that day.
Pride, regret, anticipation, anxiety - all of these were mixed.
Spending time together at school with friends for the last time also had big meaning.
Because we would each go our own ways from now on, it felt more precious.
It was also really touching when my parents said they were proud of me.
Especially when I saw my mom crying while congratulating me, I also got choked up.
And that day was a day that made me look back at the past and think about the future.
I thought about what I learned in college life and how I should live going forward.
I think those various meanings overlapped to make it a special day.
